channel.title: The Bod Mod Show
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/
channel.description: The Bod Mod show covers everything Body Modification related. Tattoos, Body Piercing, Ritual and Culturally Significant Rites of Passage, etc. We use a format of previously recorded segments as well as live interviews with people who are important in the field of body ornamentation and modification. Tune in every week at 10 pm Pacific. Hosted by Brett Perkins of Anomaly in Los Angeles, CA and John Johnson of Outer Limits in Long Beach, CA. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:author: brettperkins
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Bod Mod Show
channel.itunes:summary: The Bod Mod show covers everything Body Modification related. Tattoos, Body Piercing, Ritual and Culturally Significant Rites of Passage, etc. We use a format of previously recorded segments as well as live interviews with people who are important in the field of body ornamentation and modification. Tune in every week at 10 pm Pacific. Hosted by Brett Perkins of Anomaly in Los Angeles, CA and John Johnson of Outer Limits in Long Beach, CA. This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
channel.itunes:keywords: tattoo, body piercing, scarification, branding, suspension, body modification

item.author: bodmodshow@gmail.com
item.description: Tune in to suspension performer/model/ all around great girl _CRASH_ as she tells us about her record breaking multiple transistion suspension. We'll learn all about what makes her tick and as usual all questions are welcome.

item.title: EPISODE10 - The Bod Mod Show
item.author: bodmodshow@gmail.com
item.description: We answer questions that listeners have emailed, talk about piercing tips and tricks, some differences in jewelry design, and modification in pop culture. As always callers are welcome.
item.itunes:author: brettperkins
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE10 - The Bod Mod Show

item.title: EPISODE9 - The Bod Mod Show "Suspension Episode"
item.author: bodmodshow@gmail.com
item.description: Brett returns from a recent trip to San Francisco and talks about his journeys, a suspension party hosted by the Bay City Hookers, and we hear some of the long awaited interviews from Catalina Island Camping. Fear not, we will return to jewelry episodes in the coming weeks and we will always be glad to take calls.
item.itunes:author: brettperkins
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE9 - The Bod Mod Show "Suspension Episode"
item.itunes:summary: Brett returns from a recent trip to San Francisco and talks about his journeys, a suspension party hosted by the Bay City Hookers, and we hear some of the long awaited interviews from Catalina Island Camping. Fear not, we will return to jewelry episodes in the coming weeks and we will always be glad to take calls.
item.itunes:keywords: tattoo, body piercing, scarification, branding, suspension, body modification

item.title: EPISODE8 - The Bod Mod Show ft. Jason Pfohl of Gorilla Glass
item.author: bodmodshow@gmail.com
item.description: We will be learning about glass body jewelry. It's uses in older cultures as well as modern piercing. Jason Pfohl of Gorilla Glass will share his knowledge of various types of glass, new lead laws how they pertain to glass jewelry, and various other important body jewelry information. This is part 2 of our continuing series on body jewelry. Please feel free to call in with any questions. (We had a mix-up over time changes and software updates last week and were unable to get Jason on the phone at the right time, so we are re-doing it on election day)
item.itunes:author: brettperkins
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE8 - The Bod Mod Show ft. Jason Pfohl of Gorilla Glass

item.title: EPISODE7 - The Bod Mod Show ft. Erica Skadsen and Michael Sims
item.author: bodmodshow@gmail.com
item.description: Join us in welcoming Erica Skadsen of Organic, LLC and Michael Sims of Esoteric Body. The discussion will focus mainly on natural materials for body jewelry: horn, bone, wood, amber, shell, etc. This marks the first in a series of shows on body jewelry, helping the professional and enthusiast alike know more about what they're wearing. Listener's calls and questions are appreciated. You can email questions in advance to bodmodshow@gmail.com.
item.itunes:author: brettperkins
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE7 - The Bod Mod Show ft. Erica Skadsen and Michael Sims

item.title: EPISODE6 - The Bod Mod Show "Return from Catalina Island"
item.author: bodmodshow@gmail.com
item.description: We recap the weekend spent on Catalina for the Ephemme Suspension Performance camping getaway. As always feel free to call in with your questions and comments.
item.itunes:author: brettperkins

item.title: EPISODE5 - The Bod Mod Show "picking your piercer"
item.author: bodmodshow@gmail.com
item.description: We discuss a piercee's bill of rights and important things to look for in a shop when seeking a new mod. Callers are encouraged to participate. The audio quality is still pretty bad and on some computers you may notice clipping. After the first ten or fifteen minutes the sound gets a little more tolerable but still some technical difficulties.
item.itunes:author: brettperkins
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE5 - The Bod Mod Show "picking your piercer"

item.title: EPISODE4 - The Bod Mod Show ft. D. Nick from Nomad in San Francisco.
item.author: bodmodshow@gmail.com
item.description: Nick Aguilar is the owner of Nomad Body Piercing Studio on Market St. in San Francisco, CA. Nomad is rich in body mod history being on the forefront of freehand piercing and tribal recognition long before most Westerners. As always, news related to body modification is discussed by the hosts and callers.
item.itunes:author: brettperkins
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE4 - The Bod Mod Show ft. D. Nick from Nomad in San Francisco.

item.itunes:keywords: tattoo, body piercing, scarification, branding, suspension, body modification

item.title: EPISODE3 - The Bod Mod Show ft. ILOCKS from Comes A Time in Fairfax, VA
item.author: bodmodshow@gmail.com
item.description: We talk about modification news and developments with our buddy ILOCKS, live in the studio after flying in from Comes A Time Tattoo and Body Piercing (Fairfax, VA). He joins our panel and adds another perspective on this third episode.
item.itunes:author: brettperkins
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE3 - The Bod Mod Show ft. ILOCKS from Comes A Time in Fairfax, VA
item.itunes:summary: We talk about modification news and developments with our buddy ILOCKS, live in the studio after flying in from Comes A Time Tattoo and Body Piercing (Fairfax, VA). He joins our panel and adds another perspective on this third episode.

item.title: EPISODE2 - The Bod Mod Show ft. Chris Glunt from Outer Limits in Anaheim
item.author: bodmodshow@gmail.com
item.description: We interview International body piercer and traveling modification artist Chris Glunt who tells us about his travels to Mexico, Thailand and other far reaches of the globe. We also interview Hobo Steve who is a nice young lad that recently had a new piercing placement executed on his face and named after him. There are of course news stories related to body modification, and live call in lines at the end of the show. There were audio malfunctions in the beginning of this episode so if you hear dead air just fast forward to when the talking begins again. This is an unedited podcast of the live broadcast. Thanks!
item.itunes:author: brettperkins
item.itunes:subtitle: EPISODE2 - The Bod Mod Show ft. Chris Glunt from Outer Limits in Anaheim
